name: Block Logic Controller
author: Zourbuth

sections.description:
This plugin shows and hides block based on several criteria or conditions set to it. If criteria is matched, the block will be shown or hidden based on selection action.

Key Features & Options

Logic actions:

  • Show block.
  • Hide block.
  • Replace block.

Logic criteria:

  • User logged in/out.
  • Using mobile device.
  • User roles.
  • User metakeys.

Supports & Features

Need some custom modifications that aren’t already included? Or do you want more features on next release? Feel free to get in touch about any of your queries via support forum.
sections.installation:
You can use the built in installer and upgrader, or you can install the plugin manually.

  • Go to the menu ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Install’ and search for ‘Block Logic Controller’
  • Click ‘install’
sections.faq:
Can I use any blocks for plugin?

Yes, you can use any blocks for this plugin, please use the logic settings.
